inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient is in the emergency room

inclusion.criterion: expected LOS of at least 24 hours
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient has been in the hospital for 3 days

exclusion.criterion: previous diagnosis of diabetes or pre-diabetes
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: admitted for diabetic ketoacidosis or hyperglycemic hyperosmolar states
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: patient is experiencing hyperglycemia and concern for possible diabetic ketoacidosis

exclusion.criterion: treated with chronic corticosteroid therapy at supraphysiological doses
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 24-year-old man with type 1 diabetes who has been experiencing hyperglycemia and concern for possible diabetic ketoacidosis after not taking his insulin for 3 days.
